definition: Alfred Wegener (1880-1930), German meteorologist and geophysicist, the originator of the theory of continental drift/also written 魏格納|魏格纳
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: This study showed that Wegener's granulomatosis was a multi-system involvement disease.
sentences.chinese: 本研究顯示韋格納肉芽腫是一種多系統受累的疾病。

sentences.english: Wegener's granulomatosis is a necrotizing vasculitis.
sentences.chinese: 韋格納氏肉芽腫是一種壞死性血管炎。
